name: Paw Champion
description:
Play Paw Champion to win the Food Bucket and Get the food for the eternity.

Choose your side between cat and dog, and play as Hockey player.

Log :

- In Development

- Contains bug

- Issue with enemy turn

Control :

- Click the cat and drag, when u release the mouse it will go to the opposite direction of the mouse.

- press Z to move the dog.
